column2: The Triforce is a very valuble piece device created by the goddesses. Owning a single piece can give me an advantage.
The Codes condemn all weakness. It states that even parents must not allow weakness among their own bloodline.

The Codes condemn all weakness. It states that even parents must not allow weakness among their own bloodline. However the individual does not need to be killed and instead be forbiden from breeding and be disowned.
Form the Knights of Greater Hyrule
